title: All Ball - Pt. 3 with Maurice Clarett on Rebuilding, Mental Health, Educating Athletes, Perspective
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 3 with Maurice Clarett on Rebuilding, Mental Health, Educating Athletes, Perspective
description:
In this episode, Doug concludes his extended three part interview with former Ohio State standout running back and national champion Maurice Clarett, who discusses how he rebuilt of life after prison, why he's able to get his message across to today's athletes effectively, his struggle to get proper mental health diagnosis while inside, how he started educating himself while in prison, why his early morning workout regimen is a key to his success, his plans for the next 10 years, and how he takes time to give himself perspective. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
